ai.summary: An ultra-short, easy walk on Carn Brea BR 6 in the United Kingdom. This 0.3 km route is suitable for most ages and fitness levels, taking you from the start along a gentle path to a hilltop viewpoint. It's ideal for a quick outing, a family stroll, or a pocket-sized workout with minimal effort.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly surfaced path with a gentle rise. The final approach may include steps or uneven ground near the summit. Expect a short, easy climb and some open ground at the top.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather before you go and wear sturdy footwear with good grip. Stay on the marked path, be mindful of other walkers, and carry a light layer, water, and a charged phone for emergencies. The summit area can be windy and exposed; leave no litter and supervise children and pets.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or sneakers with good grip
Sun protection (hat and sunscreen) if sunny
Phone with a charged battery and offline map
Personal ID and basic first-aid items
ai.best_seasons: Year-round in the UK; spring and autumn offer mild temperatures and good visibility, while summer provides longer daylight. Winter can be windy and cold; adjust gear accordingly.

seo.title: Carn Brea BR 6 – Easy 0.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the quick, easy 0.3 km Carn Brea BR 6 hike in the UK. Short route, gentle incline, safety tips, gear suggestions, and best seasons.
